title: Thorn Whip
content: ffects, buffing Characters, or interacting with the environment. While casting usually Spells uses up Spell Slots, the number of which a character has is increased as the character increases in spellcaster Classes' levels, Cantrips are Spells that can be cast without using up Spell Slots. To balance this out, Cantrips usually are weaker Spells, that are mainly used as utility both inside and outside of battle.
